channel.title: Adding text to login page
channel.description: Hey guys. I am wondering how I can add and place text to a login screen. I need it to be a certain size too. I want to add a button that changed the gameframe from the title page, how can I add text that changed once the button is clicked. So it says like 474, then once you click it it changed to 506. Can anyone help me out?

item.title: Adding text to login page
item.dc:creator: @codyorr4 codyorr4
item.description:
@codyorr4 wrote:

search for the text that already on the login page,

go into files>use search bar>search the login text

by doing this you will find and change the login text.

as for the buttons, idk never messed with them.

makes me want to change them though. :3

Read full topic
